Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back FJ$300 RESORT CREDIT* View gallery / Back Malolo aerial view Malolo island resort Malolo kids club Malolo restaurants and pool Malolo pools Malolo jetty Fiji Malolo Island Resort &vert; Return flights • 7 Nights • Transfers Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Surrounded by a blue lagoon, soft sands, coconut palms and brilliant green rainforest, Malolo Island Resort is an island paradise in the Mamanuca Group. Designed along the lines of copra plantations of colonial times, its rustic bures are decorated in plantation style, each with a veranda and views, perfect for families, couples or friends. Malolo Island Resort participate in the Loloma Hour, dubbed "The world's first happy hour for the environment". The resort is offering Iguana conservation programme, cultural activities, reef stars, planting a seed. For more information about Loloma Hour and what it offers click HERE . View more View less 7 nights + flights, transfers & more from $ 2969 per person share twin Flying with Fiji Airways FJ$300 RESORT CREDIT* Enquire now Sale Period : until 10 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes Return Value class airfares flying Fiji Airways from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Nadi 5 nights accommodation at Malolo Island Resort 2 nights accommodation at Fiji Gateway Hotel (pre/post) Return Nadi Airport/Hotel & Catamaran transfers Malolo Island Resort Inclusions Choose from ONE of the following services (to the value of FJD$300): Spa treatments -OR- Food & Beverage -OR- Water Sport Activities FREE use of all non-motorised watersports including, catamarans, windsurfers, stand-up paddle boards, snorkelling gear and kayaks. FREE selected land-based activities Fijian welcome with complimentary welcome drink (non-alcoholic) and cold towels on arrival FREE Fijian & South Pacific Cultural Experiences: Invitation to weekly Management Cocktail Party & Fijian Cultural Show, the Malolo Island Resort Dancers featuring Fire & Dance from the South Pacific, and Kava Ceremony & Tasting Add On: Breakfast, lunch & dinner daily at Malolo Island Resort from $165 per adult / $59 per child (4-12yrs) per day Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland Island Bure Blending colonial and Fijian styles, these 33sqm bures offer a semi-open plan layout and feature a 14sqm verandah, perfect for relaxing and enjoying the surroundings. Terms & Conditions Sale ends 10 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 13 Oct 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Packages are applicable for new bookings only. Package prices are based on return Value class flying Fiji Airways to Nadi from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch. Airfares are based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax & surcharge increases. • Flight departures from New Zealand are based on: from Auckland daily, from Wellington on a Monday, Thursday and Saturday and from Christchurch on a Monday, Thursday, Saturday and Sunday • Travel dates specified are subject to departure days from NZ and are subject to change based on availability • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Some surcharges, closeouts, flight, routing and accommodation restrictions apply • Bedding configurations may vary • Any value adds or meal/beverage packages that are unused are not refundable, transferable & cannot be exchanged for cash • If adding a Meal /Beverage package it must be purchased for all adults for the full duration of your accommodation • Min/max stays apply • Full payment is required at time of booking • Availability during school holiday & peak travel periods may be limited • Advertised prices are per person share twin based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferable and name changes are not permitted • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Child costs where advertised are based on up to 2 children 11 years and under sharing accommodation with 2 adults using existing bedding • Where Kids eat free, this is from selected restaurants, from selected menus at set times • Kids club age restrictions apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. * FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. For finance terms and conditions visit hot.co.nz/payment-options.
